A '''resin brick slab''' is a [[Resin Bricks|resin brick]] variant of a [[slab]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Resin brick slabs can be mined using a [[pickaxe]]. When mined without a pickaxe, it drops nothing.

{{breaking row|Resin Brick Slab|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}

=== Note Blocks ===
Resin brick slabs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.

== Sounds ==
{{IN|Bedrock}}, when a resin brick  slab is combined into a double slab, the block's use sound is played.<ref>{{Bug|MCPE-79659}}</ref>
